ruleSummaries.description: All structure elements shall belong to, or be role mapped to, at least one of the following namespaces specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.8.6: — the PDF 1.7 namespace; — the PDF 2.0 namespace; — the MathML namespace

ruleSummaries.description: The PDF/UA version of a file shall be specified in the value of the Metadata entry in the document catalog using the PDF/UA identification schema

checks.context: root/document[0]/metadata[0](5 0 obj PDMetadata)/XMPPackage[0]
checks.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/UA Identification Schema

ruleSummaries.description: A Figure structure element shall have at least one of the following properties: a) an alternate description (Alt property), as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.9.3; b) a replacement text (ActualText property) that represents the content enclosed by the Figure structure element

ruleSummaries.description: The structure tree root shall contain a single Document structure element as its only child, as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, Annex L and ISO/TS 32005

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](12 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)
checks.errorMessage: The structure tree root contains Sect element(s) instead of a single Document structure element

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](12 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)
checks.errorMessage: StructTreeRoot either doesn't contain or contains more than one <Document>

ruleSummaries.description: All destinations whose target lies within the current document shall be structure destinations

checks.context: root/document[0]/Outlines[0](outline 10 0)/A[0](11 0 obj PDGoToAction)
checks.errorMessage: Destination in GoTo action is not a structure destination

ruleSummaries.description: The ViewerPreferences dictionary of the document catalog dictionary shall be present and shall contain at least the DisplayDocTitle key with a value of true, as described in ISO 32000-2:2020, Table 147

checks.context: root
checks.errorMessage: ViewerPreferences dictionary is not present in the document Catalog, or DisplayDocTitle key is set to false or is not present in the ViewerPreferences dictionary (ViewerPreferences = null, DisplayDocTitle = null)

validationResult.statement: PDF file is not compliant with Validation Profile requirements.
